Subskills.name: Wide Slice
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of fast slices.

Subskills.name: Slashing Strike
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by fast slices.

Subskills.name: Flaming Blades
Subskills.description: Every slice additionally unleashes a wave of fire inflicting burning for a portion of the damage.

Subskills.name: Expert Slayer
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using fast slices.

Subskills.name: Demon's Heart
Subskills.description: Chance to heat target souls causing them to explode after a brief moment dealing area of effect damage.

Subskills.name: Ferocious Slice
Subskills.description: Chance to knock monsters airborne causing them to deal area of effect damage upon landing on the third hit.

Subskills.name: Burning Blade
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict burning on hit.

Subskills.name: High Strike
Subskills.description: Your third attack sends enemies high in the air causing them to deal area of effect damage upon landing.

Subskills.name: Slayer's Intellect
Subskills.description: Decreases mana cost when using fast slices.

Subskills.name: Swift Deadstrike
Subskills.description: Increases critical strike damage when using fast slices.

Subskills.name: Detonation Slice
Subskills.description: Your third attack now causes monsters to unleash an explosion dealing area of effect damage.

Subskills.name: Shadow Daggers
Subskills.description: Throw multiple piercing daggers with each slash.
